pr_title: Update Apache commons-codec to latest version (1.14)

timeline.message: Update Apache commons-codec to latest version (1.14)

timeline.bodyText: Why do we need to keep the old versions as well?
timeline.author: tevans78

replies.bodyText: I don't know everyone who might be using some of the old versions, but I know some FATs use some of the older libraries. I don't want to dive into making sure everyone's happy and working with the latest version just to get this upgrade delivered.
replies.author: ayoho
